profile.name: Anthony Fu
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @vercel / @nuxt
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a passion for browser development, testing frameworks, and plugin development. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | @vercel / @nuxt
description: Developed browser extensions using TypeScript and JavaScript.
Created testing frameworks for popular editors like VS Code.
Designed and implemented plugins for VS Code, including 'vscode-icons-carbon', 'eslint-config-flat-gitignore', and 'markdown-it-github-alerts'.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects, including TypeScript-based and JavaScript projects.
Developed plugins for popular editors like VS Code.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including TypeScript-based and JavaScript projects.
Improved code quality and added new features.
